title: Your favorite champ opens a store
body:
What do they sell?
{{champion:412}}: SOULS FOR SALE!!

replies.body: mandatory {{champion:80}} bakery
http://66.media.tumblr.com/bea3d62952bea5c696679a858a6d3c23/tumblr_mn3pp49grn1re04pso1_500.jpg

{{champion:201}}: Braum's Warm Goat's Milk 

Ever get tired of blocking shots for your allies?  Maybe a bit exhausted after a gank from Shaco?  Well, you've came across the right product!  Braum's Warm Goat's Milk is the perfect product for all supports across Summoner's Rift!  Made from genuine goat's milk from Braum's farm, you can sustain your allies while enjoying a refreshing glass of goat's milk.  Buy now!

_20% of the profits go to support mains._

EDIT: As I'm typing this up, I find a website that actually advertises a milk by the name of Braum lol.
They thought of the idea before hand!

{{champion:14}} Sion's Global Monorail System

Gets you anywhere in 8 seconds! 

_Visit our website for information, locations, and ticket purchase._

{{champion:92}} "Blade warranties"


(Their you happy now you grammar nazi's >.>)

Gauntlet Store: Now selling super-galaxy/neon-strike gloves.

> [{quoted}](name=Sacred Knight,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=feq9UUM7,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-05-26T05:47:22.919+0000)
>

FTFY
compromise, just let it be a general shipping store. sells starter kits so you can ship who you want from the comfort of your couch.

The shipping kit.
includes:
.*Both your favorite characters
.*Ship
.*Beds

other parts each sold seperately

Other parts? Other PARTS?

I am scared what these *ahem* parts are. >.>

{{champion:82}} Mordekaiser's Shredding Emporium
We sell everything from guitar rigs that f*cking melt eleven, Metal weaponry and teacups.

Wait...

So does that mean that the guitars go up to the fabled volume **12**????!!!!
you are thinking very small here, mordes guitars go up to 13

Be warned, if you see the owner drinking it is not a good time to enter the store.

Its his ptsd, and shit will go down if you talk to him.

http://media.lolusercontent.com/api/embedly/1/image/resize?url=http%3A%2F%2Forig00.deviantart.net%2F8502%2Ff%2F2014%2F015%2F0%2Fa%2Fmordekaiser_is_no_longer__1_by_eltonel-d729tog.jpg&key=a45e967db0914c7fb472fd4381e6c85b&width=425
